quote: The leader’s joy is the success of change, the evidence of progress and the actualization of a better life.
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Leaders' Frontpage: Leadership Insights from 21 Martin Luther King Jr. Thoughts
category: achievement, achievements, actualization, actualize, better-life, change, clinton, evidence, food-for-thought, israelmore-ayivor, joy, leader, leaders, leadership, macron, martin-luther, martin-luther-king, martin-luther-king-jr, obama, progress, trump

quote: We’ll never abandon ourselves to the Spirit as long as we think we can change without Him.
author: Larry Crabb, The Pressure's Off: There's a New Way to Live

quote: To wipe out abuse is not enough; you have to change people's whole outlook. The mill is no longer standing, but the wind's still there, blowing away.
author: Victor Hugo, Les Misérables

quote: Guilt cannot change you
author: it can only hint that there’s something worth your effort to change.

quote: Anything can be changed by those who have the courage to blaze their own path.
author: Emily R. King, The Hundredth Queen

quote: Anyone who's ever gone from warm and bright to cold and dark knows how I felt.
author: Lauren Wolk, Wolf Hollow

quote: The things that had changed seem out of place, and the things that had remained the same made Charlie feel out of place.
author: Scott Cawthon, Five Nights at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes

quote: Changes ain't totally pleasant but they're excellent things... Two years is about long enough for things to stay exactly the same. If they stayed put any longer they might grow mossy.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Perhaps many things inside you have been transformed; perhaps somewhere, someplace deep inside your being, you have undergone important changes while you were sad. The only sadnesses that are dangerous and unhealthy are the ones that we carry around in public in order to drown them out with the noise; like diseases that are treated superficially and foolishly, they just withdraw and after a short interval break out again all the more terribly; and gather inside us and are life, are life that is unlived, rejected, lost, life that we can die of.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke, Letters to a Young Poet
category: change, dangerous, depth, die, life, sadness, within

quote: The change is for a cause.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Today was the end of freedom. High school had fallen behind
author: college loomed ahead. Tomorrow he traded freedom and Arizona for Colorado and discipline.

quote: It's too late to change the world, but, hopefully it's not too late to change ourselves.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Everything's always changing, Charlie. We become who we are. The mask melts into the face.
author: Garth Risk Hallberg, City on Fire
category: change, city-on-fire, garth-risk-hallberg, identity, mask, metaphor

quote: The human mind’s innate ability to imagine and create ensures that we never remain stalled out in who we are. We constantly seek to amend our circumference and circumstances, craft and redraft our emotional, social, political, economic, and artistic being.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls
category: artistic, artists, change, human-mind, identity, identity-crisis, imagination, metamorphosis, mind, personality, personality-development, self, self-awareness, self-awareness-quotes, self-creation, self-identity, transformation, transformation-quotes

quote: Change begins with ourselves.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: If you think that climate change and global warming are hoaxes, then you are easily fooled.
author: Steven Magee
category: change, climate, easily, fooled, global, hoaxes, think, warming

quote: There are no electromagnetic field (EMF) book millionaires yet, but that may change with the roll out of the fifth generation (5G) wireless networks.
author: Steven Magee
category: 5g, book, change, electromagnetic, emf, field, fifth, generation, millionaires, networks, out, roll, wireless, yet

quote: In order to validate our Africanness, we hold on to tradition at all cost, banning critical engagement in an attempt to preserve its sacredness
author: Malebo Sephodi
category: africa, change, feminism, feminist, feminist-quotes, misbehave

quote: Use your now well now! There is always another day to change something, but all the days we may meet may never be the same. Use your now well now!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah
category: chances, change, do-something-today, mind-your-time, opportunities-in-life, plan-well, time-passing

quote: Change, it seems, is inevitable. And so is compromise.
author: Fennel Hudson, Fine Things - Fennel's Journal - No. 8

quote: Things today ‘sure ain’t like they used to be’. They’ve changed, moved on, progressed.
author: Fennel Hudson, Fine Things - Fennel's Journal - No. 8

quote: Yoga is the best way to learn to adapt and adjust to the changing environments.
author: Amit Ray, Yoga The Science of Well-Being
category: adapt-and-adjust, adaptation, adjust, adjustment, change, changing-environment, changing-your-mindset

quote: it is only in social relations that we are human...to be human women must share in the totality of humanity's common life. Women, forced to lead restricted lives, retard all human progress. Growth of organism, the individual or social body requires use of all of our powers in four areas: physical, intellectual, spiritual and social
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman, Herland

quote: The beauty of being alive is that each day you are given another chance to correct what you did wrong and improve on what you can do right.
author: Gift Gugu Mona
category: alive, beauty, chance, change, correction, improve, right, wrong

quote: There was nothing she would ever change about him , except for who he thought she was.
author: R.J. Groves, Writing You: An Unlikely Romance
category: change, dishonesty, lies, love, love-story, nothing-i-would-change

quote: Avoiding change is denying the path that leads to your spiritual growth.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz
category: change, change-your-perception, perception-of-self, self-awareness, self-growth-and-improvement, self-love-self-respect, self-worth-and-love, spiritual-development, spiritual-growth, spiritual-life, spiritual-wisdom, spiritualism

quote: She wasn’t going to sit and wait. She was done waiting, because you could spend your whole life waiting for something to happen. Something big. You could wait and wait, and even if something big happened, even if it finally happened—it didn’t change anything.
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes, Nobody

quote: Millennials, instead of a danger, are really a reflection of the society in which they grew up in, and in which all of us now live.
author: Crystal Kadakia, The Millennial Myth: Transforming Misunderstanding Into Workplace Breakthroughs

quote: Life’s journey does not take place down an easy roadway, as some might imagine. It takes place inside a giant house with a million doorways. Every day of our lives we are faced with decisions to make, doorways to walk through. It can be confusing at times, like walking through a carnival maze. Some decisions we make are big, some small, but they all have consequences..
author: K. Martin Beckner, A Million Doorways

quote: After a long time i saw my self in mirror and i find-out a berthing machine
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari, "Zaki's Gift Of Love"

quote: Everything changes, sweetheart. The universe loves to happen.
author: Lance Olsen, Calendar of Regrets
category: calendar-of-regrets, change, coming-of-age, growing-up, happening, lance-olsen, things-happen, universe

quote: Poverty should first be addressed in the mind because even if you give millions to a poor person, until there's a change of mindset, they will still remain the same.
author: Gift Gugu Mona
category: addressed, change, millions, mind, mind-set, poor-person, poverty, remain-the-same

quote: I had changed, and gone on changing, but I did not fully remember how it had begun, or understand why.
author: Susan Hill, Mrs de Winter

quote: We cannot change or put right the past, it is our choice whether to be happy in this very moment. The present is all we have and problems only live in the past or the future.
author: Kate Skylark, Daddy's Wicked Parties: The Most Shocking True Story of Child Abuse Ever Told

quote: Change is a quintessential element of progress. Without change, progress is non-existent.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Either Civilized or Phobic: A Treatise on Homosexuality

quote: The most important thing I can add from my own observations is this: Knowing it started from unremarkable circumstances should be a comfort to us all. Because it proves that you don't need much to change the entire world for the better. You can start with the most ordinary ingridients. You can start with the world you've got.
author: Catherine Ryan Hyde, Pay It Forward
category: better, change, change-the-world, inspirational, life, world

quote: Easter is the miracle of transformation as seen in the change of seasons, in the maturation of mortal persons, and in the resurrection of souls.
author: Richelle E. Goodrich, Slaying Dragons
category: change, easter, easter-quotes, richelle, richelle-e-goodrich, richelle-goodrich, seasons

quote: I love you," "I was wrong," and "I apologize" are powerful words. They can save marriages, deepen friendships, and change lives. Don't be afraid to use them.
author: John Hawkins, 101 Things All Young Adults Should Know

quote: The key thing to keep in mind is that people do change, but they do it in their own time, for their own reasons. That's why you can hope for change, you can encourage change, you can communicate that you want change, but there are never any guarantees that it will happen.
author: John Hawkins, 101 Things All Young Adults Should Know

quote: The Great Question before us is: Are we doomed? The Great Question before us is: Will the Past release us? The Great Question before us is: Can we Change? In Time? And we all desire that Change will come.
author: Tony Kushner, Angels in America

quote: Change is the medium to become who you wish to be.
author: Steven Redhead, Life Is A Cocktail

quote: It doesn't mean anything;It doesn't change anything,Except the way I see myself,And it's not supposed to do that.I shouldn't feel this way;I should cry this way,But I kind of do.Yeah, I kind of do.
author: Margo T. Rose, The Words
category: alone, change, cry, crying, depression, feel, feelings, hurt, i-do, lonely, meaning, myself, pain, sadness, sorrow, supposed-to

quote: You can only get to where you want to be, through where you are now.
author: Catherine Louise Birmingham

quote: Pain means change is coming. When you are going through a hell, or turmoil, know that change is coming. Don't be afraid of pain, losing, failing or trying - change is coming. There's no gain without pain, just hold on, change is coming. God is not yet finished, hold on.
author: Kabelo Mabona

quote: Every year is a year of impact, a month of change and a day of new encounters. Its all in the mind to make the impact, see the change and conquer new encounters.
author: Kabelo Mabona

quote: Our surroundings fade and we exist in unison, two people who once shared cups of coffee, unprecedentedly ourselves in a changing world.
author: Caroline George, The Vestige
category: change, coffee, couple, fall-in-love, kiss, love, relationship, romance, the-end-of-the-world

quote: How much could the person you love change, and still remain the same person to whom you'd made your promise? We don't expect our lovers to remain the same over the course of a long relationship. In fact, if you're married at sixty-five to the same person you married when you were twenty, your marriage has probably failed. But there are changes, over time, that spell doom for a marriage, although exactly what these are, and to what degree, varies from couple to couple. For some people, vast changes over time make no difference to the fundamental sense of devotion one soul has for another. But for others, relatively small changes can push things to the breaking point: gaining or losing weight, gaining or losing faith, gaining or losing wealth. How does any relationship survive in the end, when change is the only constant?
author: Jennifer Finney Boylan, Long Black Veil

quote: The researchers argued that an orderly environment fosters a sense of responsibility not so much by deterrence (since Groningen police rarely penalize litterers) as by the signaling of a social norm: This is the kind of place where people obey the rules.
author: Steven Pinker, The Better Angels of Our Nature: Why Violence Has Declined

quote: Change plus innovation equals progress!
author: Israelmore Ayivor, Become a Better You
category: change, equal-to, equals, food-for-thought, growth, improvement, innovation, israelmore-ayivor, plus, progress

quote: You’re young, and like anything new. It’s change you want. I’m middle-aged, and there’s nothing staler to me than change. Constant comfort and little luxuries as regular as the clock are fresher than change.
author: John     Davidson

quote: Remember, life is a bit tough most of the time.Also remember, if it was easy it would be boring.
author: Akash Lakhotia, World Hypnotized: Making of the Fuhrer
category: change, life, literature, meaning, meaningful, meaningoflife, neverregret, nonfiction, philosophical, prose, regretless, remember, thought, thoughtbubble, thoughtful, thoughts, thoughtsandfeelings, time, worldhypnotized

quote: Aversion to change is denial of destiny.
author: Andy Harglesis

quote: Change is automatic, but progress is not. Death is certain, but LIVING a good life is a CHOICE
author: Sesan Kareem

quote: It is through victims such as myself who still have a voice that the world will change to be a better place.
author: Catherine Jane Fisher, I am Catherine Jane: The True Story of One Woman's Quest for Justice
category: better-place, change, courage, rape, survivor, voice, world

quote: No matter what we think we should do, I don’t think you can coerce yourself into loving your neighbor—or your boss—when you can’t stand him. But if you try to understand your feelings of dislike with mindfulness and compassion, being sure not to forget self-compassion, you create the possibility for change.
author: Sharon Salzberg, Real Love: The Art of Mindful Connection
category: change, compassion, love, mindfulness, real-love, real-love-quotes, self-compassion, understanding

quote: A violinist fiddled.With strings resined for winter.Summer's light splintered.
author: H.S. Crow
category: change, haiku, haiku-quotes, haikus, nature, preparation, seasons-of-life, summer, violinist, winter

quote: Some days punch us in the gut so hard it seems we can feel the whole universe gasp with despair.
author: Curtis Tyrone Jones
category: broken-heart, brokenness, catastrophe, change, change-of-events, circumstances, despair, devastation, gasping, guts, hard-to-breath, hardships, pain, unexpected-changes, unexpected-turns, universe

quote: Change, I've come to understand, rises up like nausea: the promise of relief is what makes it bearable.
author: Durga Chew-Bose, Too Much and Not the Mood

quote: Dear God, Thank you for waking me up today and for your everlasting love and never ending mercy and for my blessed day ahead.
author: Germany Kent
category: be-encouraged, believe, believers-in-god, change, change-is-coming, change-is-constant, change-is-good, change-is-possible, change-quotes, change-your-life, changes, dont-give-up, dont-give-up-quotes, dont-quit, encourage-yourself, encouragement-and-attitude, encouragement-quotes, encouragements, germany-kent, germany-kent-quote, germany-kent-quotes, god, god-quotes, god-s-messages, god-s-will, gods-grace, gods-plan, have-a-little-faith, have-faith, have-faith-in-god, have-faith-in-your-future, have-faith-in-your-self, have-faith-in-yourself, hold-on, hold-onto-god, hope-guru, peace-of-mind, peace-of-mind-quotes, stay-focused, stay-strong, stay-strong-and-positive, staying-positive, the-hope-guru, truth, truth-of-life, wait-on-god

quote: Tony and Peg have two kids, Terry-Lynn and Harvey, both of whom are enrolled in so many extracurricular and afterschool clubs that they hardly ever see their parents. If Terry-Lynn is in Girl Guides, she doesn’t have to see Peg inviting the Purolator man in for “a cup of coffee”. If Harvey is in the anime drawing club, he doesn’t have to see Peg kissing Mr. Cooper from across the street, even if all the other neighbours secretly know what’s going on. Tony has no idea, all he knows is that Peg isn’t the same Peg he married back in 2003. All he knows is that she’s changed a great deal, and not for the better, like a beautiful butterfly regressing back into a devouring, ugly caterpillar in the span of only a couple of months.
author: Rebecca McNutt, Listen is Silent, or The Usurer
category: affair, afterschool, anime, beautiful, butterfly, caterpillar, change, cheater, children, coffee, drawing, extracurricular-activities, girl-scouts, homewrecker, kids, kiss, marriage, neighbours, parents, purolator, street, ugly

quote: Those who spend all they earn always end in penury.
author: Bamigboye Olurotimi
category: always, business, change, choice, debt, earn, end, focus, investment, lack, life, penury, poverty, saving, spend, time, vision

quote: When we hesitate to change on time, we predispose ourselves to miss the boat that would take us to our envious future...
author: Assegid Habtewold, The 9 Cardinal Building Blocks: For Continued Success in Leadership

quote: Change for someone today and tomorrow you will hear them say, "You are not the same.
author: Akash Lakhotia, World Hypnotized: Making of the Fuhrer
category: attributednosource, beyourself, change, experience, life, lifelessons, literature, love, nonfiction, philosophical, prose, thought, thoughtfortheday, thoughts, worldhypnotized

quote: There is a reason life has put you in the current circumstances,Life will always test you, it will always try to make you stronger.Life only wants you to be better then you were yesterday.
author: Akash Lakhotia, World Hypnotized: Making of the Fuhrer
category: change, life, literature, meaning, meaningful, meaningoflife, neverregret, nonfiction, philosophical, prose, regretless, remember, thought, thoughtbubble, thoughtful, thoughts, thoughtsandfeelings, time

quote: When discontent sets in it's time to make some changes. In a world where so much is possible, yet so many people are unhappy, there has to be another way.
author: Chris Guillebeau, The Happiness of Pursuit: Finding the Quest That Will Bring Purpose to Your Life
category: change, chris-guillebeau, discontent, happy, the-happiness-of-pursuit, unhappy

quote: Change forced by others is difficult to accept. And too rapid a change causes instability.
author: Amish Tripathi, The Immortals of Meluha

quote: You have taught them to think differently. That is how we beat the bigotry. Class by class. Year by Year
author: E. R. Braithwaite

quote: Before we leave the gravesite, Mary sings Mother's favorite gospel hymn ...Mary's lovely voice rises and lingers in the air, and by the end of the song most of us are crying. I am too, though I still don't know what those stars are meant to represent. My mistake, I suppose, is in thinking they should mean something.
author: Christina Baker Kline, A Piece of the World
category: change, death, loss, meaning, stars, symbolism

quote: Meditation does not involve trying to change your thinking by thinking some more. It involves watching thought itself. The watching is the holding. By watching your thoughts without being drawn into them, you can learn something profoundly liberating about thinking itself, which may help you to be less of a prisoner of those thought patterns (….)
author: Jon Kabat-Zinn, Wherever You Go, There You Are: Mindfulness Meditation in Everyday Life
category: change, holding-thought, liberation-about-thinking, meditation, mindfulness, not-drawn-into-thought, thinking, thought-patterns, watching-thought

quote: They put me in a box, and every time I try to nudge the lid open, they slam it back down. It’s like nothing about me is allowed to change.
author: Becky Albertalli, Simon vs. the Homo Sapiens Agenda

quote: Words are the bricks of our world and they have the power to change it.
author: Enock Maregesi

quote: Life is limited by death to make us hurry, though we can't change the past, atleast we change for good and to never repeat the same mistakes again.
author: Jinnul Jr.
category: alter, change, death, flaws, future, goodness, hurry, life, mistakes, past, present, time

quote: Our big opportunity may be right where we are right now. We have the sense to realize that a single idea can change the way we think, the way we feel, and the way we live, that right now is one of those moments when we have the ability to influence the future right now. Believe it!
author: Donald Pillai
category: believe, bright-future, change, feel, future, ideas, influence, life, love, right-now, think, thoughts, way-of-life, words

quote: We have to change our way of thinking in order to be able to accept the changes that have already begun
author: Sunday Adelaja
category: change, money, perception, riches, thoughts, wealth

quote: Some things never changed.
author: Hope Ann, Shadows of the Hersweald: A Hansel and Gretel Novella

quote: The changes of this new time will not only be noticeable around us but also within us
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Those who know God can smoothly adapt to changes
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Changes should not scare us because it is a natural process
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The creative personality is always one that looks on the world as fit for change and on himself as an instrument for change. Otherwise, what are you creating for? If the world is perfectly all right the way it is, you have no place in it. The creative personality thinks of the world as a canvas for change and of himself as a divine agent of change.
author: Jacob Bronowski, The Origins of Knowledge and Imagination

quote: We should be disciplined and responsible and then our prosperity will be stable despite any economic crisis, inflation or a change of government
author: Sunday Adelaja
category: change, crisis, despite, disciplined, economic, government, inflation, money, prosperity, responsible, riches, stable, wealth

quote: There seems to be a direct correlation between the spike in suicides by young people and the increase in cyberbullying amongst young people.
author: Germany Kent
category: action, awareness, awareness-of-life, awareness-of-the-problem, awareness-quote, awareness-quotes, blogging, bullying, bullying-isn-t-right, bullying-quotes, change, correlation, cyberbullying, develop, digital-age, digital-etiquette, digital-influencer, ethics, ethics-matter, facebook, facebook-addiction, facebook-quotes, facebook-status, germany-kent, germany-kent-quote, germany-kent-quotes, hate-speech, hope-guru, influence, influencer, instagram, insults, issues, kindness, kindness-and-love, kindness-compassion, kindness-of-strangers, kindness-to-others, learning, life-and-living, life-experience, life-lessons-quotes, life-philosophy, lifehack, lifestyle, marketing, marketing-advice, marketing-quote, marketing-quotes, media, mental-health, millennials, motivational-speaker, motivational-speaker-quotes, netiquette, on-trend, online-communication, online-visibility, personal-development, responsibility, responsibility-for-your-actions, responsibility-internet, responsibility-quotes, smart-tech, snapchat, snapchat-account-girls-hack, snapchat-account-hack, snapchat-girls, snapchat-hack, snapchat-latest-news, social-education, social-marketing, social-networking, social-networking-sites, social-networking-virtual, stop-bullying, suicidal-thoughts, suicide, suicide-attempt, suicide-thoughts, suicides, teaching, the-hope-guru, think-before-you-post, think-before-you-tweet, trends, twitter, twitter-addiction, twitter-advice, twitter-audiences, twitter-nation, twitter-quote, twitter-quotes, what-you-tweet, you-are-what-you-tweet, young-people, youth

quote: We must change our way of thinking, correct our plans and envision new ways of attaining our goals
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When you dream of change, it shines bright, like fire, and burns away all the rot that came before it. It's swift and inexorable. You cry for justice, and justice is done. The world stands with you in your fight. But if there was one thing I had learned in these last few weeks, it was that change had never been that simple. That kind of revolution existed only in daydreams.
author: Samantha Shannon, The Song Rising

quote: It's ok to reinvent yourself as many times as it takes to live out your most authentic self.
author: Nikki Rowe
category: acceptance, adaptable, authentic, becoming, change, growth, inner-peace, reinvent, self-love, truth, wild-woman, wild-women, younique

quote: But very few ordeals are redemptive and I doubt if the descent into hell teaches anything new. It can only hasten processes which are already in existence, and usually this just means that it degrades. You see, in hell one lacks the energy for any good change. This indeed is the meaning of hell.
author: Iris Murdoch, The Nice and the Good

quote: The moment when mortality, ephemerality, uncertainty, suffering, or the possibility of change arrives can split a life in two. Facts and ideas we might have heard a thousand times assume a vivid, urgent, felt reality. We knew them then, but they matter now. They are like guests that suddenly speak up and make demands upon us; sometimes they appear as guides, sometimes they just wreck what came before or shove us out the door. We answer them, when we answer, with how we lead our lives. Sometimes what begins as bad news prompts the true path of a life, a disruptive visitor that might be thanked only later. Most of us don’t change until we have to, and crisis is often what obliges us to do so. Crises are often resolved only through anew identity and new purpose, whether it’s that of a nation or a single human being.
author: Rebecca Solnit, The Faraway Nearby

quote: Nothing that remains static is truly ever alive. Nature does not abide idleness. All energy sources of the natural world and the cosmos are in a constant motion, they are in a perpetual state of fluctuation. All forms of living must make allowances for the seasons of change. The Earth itself is twirling through space, spinning on its axis analogous to a child’s top. The unpredictable forces of instability brought about by a combination of motion, change, and flux propels the miraculous dynamism of existence.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls
category: adaptability, adaptability-quotes, adapting, change, changes, maturation, of-life, seasons, transformation, transformation-quotes

quote: Being born-again Christian gives God the opportunity to gradually change your heart, mind, and thoughts
author: Sunday Adelaja
category: born-again, change, christian, god, heart, mind, opportunity, thoughts

quote: Dare to make major changes to reach your newly discovered destiny
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God knows how to turn your helplessness into strength
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: God always turns a person’s weakness into strength
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: If you want to be somebody else, change your mind.
author: Sister Hazel

quote: The momentum of all those wheels are too great for one person's passionate will.
author: K. Melissa Kennedy, The Innovation Revolution: Discover the Genius Hiding in Plain Sight

quote: We cannot force others to behave differently if they disagree with us
author: but if we change what we are saying or doing they will respond differently.

quote: Pivotal changes occur with every period of time
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: When you are loved, you can do anything in creation. When you are loved, there's no need at all to understand what's happening, because everything happens within you.
author: Paulo Coelho, The Alchemist

quote: Once you embrace that continuous change is a natural process for your growth and evolution, you will be reminded that who, what, and where you are now is a temporary condition. Understanding this fact is foundational for hope, positive change and resilient transformation.
author: Susan C. Young

quote: Re is a prefix, which when used in front of a word, changes its meaning to convey a fresh beginning, a do-over, a repeat, a shift in perspective, or an opportunity to create something new. When you add the prefix Re, you are activating the power of the word to head in a new direction to build momentum for positive change and transformation.
author: Susan C. Young

quote: Sometimes the changes in your life will be planned with strategy, optimism, and intention. Other changes, however, will catch you by surprise, sabotage your success, break your heart, cause you stress, or leave you feeling lost. Whether you are dealing with planned or unplanned change, there will always be a degree of adaptation and reorientation required in order for you to be resilient.
author: Susan C. Young

quote: The importance of reviewing is apparent and proven. However, the majority of people do not do it in their own lives. Do you want to live your best life now? Take deliberate action and begin to REVIEW where you have been, where you are now, and where you would like to be.
author: Susan C. Young
category: change, flourishing, resilience, speaker-susan-young, thriving-in-times-of-change, transform, www-susanspeaks-com

quote: Transitional periods in life are unsettling because a person’s latent fears constantly whisper warnings.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls
category: change, changes, changes-in-life, changes-in-your-life, transform, transformation, transformation-quotes, transitions-in-life

quote: Scholars postulate that the only thing that does not change is the every varying world. Other renowned thinkers postulate that the natural state of all things is to remain the same. Perhaps both propositions are vital. Perhaps it is normal to resist change because it threatens our present state of being. Perhaps it is natural to attempt to preserve the status quo because we are part of the external world and we wish to persevere, not expire. Perhaps it is inevitable that we all change. The natural forces are impossible to blunt.
author: Kilroy J. Oldster, Dead Toad Scrolls
category: ch, change, changes, changes-in-life, changing-times, changing-your-life, changing-your-thoughts, transformation, transformation-quotes

quote: In time of macromental change, only the adaptable survive.
author: Jeffrey Fry
category: adaptable, change, macromental, only, survive, time

quote: Even now, that day reminds me that raindrops are stronger than hammers.
author: Marilyn Hilton, Full Cicada Moon

quote: Start visualizing and believing the life you want to live. Your strong visualization and self belief shall take you there. It's your life no one else than you only can change it!!!
author: Santosh Adbhut Kumar

quote: Discovering that I was adopted redefined my entire world, but it taught me that who you are doesn't change.
author: DaShanne Stokes
category: adopt, adoptee, adoptees, adoption, adoption-and-attitude, adoption-day, adoption-month, adoption-search, adoption-story, change, change-quotes, discover, discover-yourself, discoveries, discovery, discovery-of-oneself, identity, identity-confusion, identity-crisis, identity-politics, identity-quotes, national-adoption-day, national-adoption-month, who-we-are

quote: You do not get to choose the events that come your way nor the sorrows that interrupt your life. They will likely be a surprise to you, catching you off quard and unprepared. You may hold your head in your hands and lament your weak condition and wonder what you ought to do. To suffer, that is common to all. To suffer and still keep your composure, your faith and your smile, that is remarkable. Pain will change you more profoundly than success or good fortune. Suffering shapes your perception of life, your values and priorities, and your goals and dreams. Your pain is changing you.
author: David Crosby

quote: Being denied their original birth certificates isn't just a problem for adoptees. It's a social problem, requiring social change.
author: DaShanne Stokes
category: adopt, adopted, adopted-kids, adoptee, adoptee-rights, adoptees, adopting, adopting-a-child, adoption, adoption-and-attitude, adoption-day, adoption-reunions, adoption-search, adoption-story, change, childhood, national-adoption-day, national-adoption-month, original-birth-certificate, social-change, social-problem, social-problems

quote: All changes are born within.
author: Abhijit Naskar, Principia Humanitas
category: change, change-quotes, change-the-world, inspirational, self-awareness, self-realization

quote: It's time to make important noise.
author: Erica Alex

quote: To be humble is to be teachable. Meek, not weak. The most humble people are the most aggressive leaders. Aggressive because to be truly taught, is to sincerely do. To lead. To start. To achieve. Willingly and urgently doing the work to make change.
author: Richie Norton
category: achieve, aggressive, aggressive-behavior, aggressively, aggressiveness, change, entrepreneurship, gandhi, humanitarian, humble, humble-power, humble-yourself, humbleness, humility, meek, piety, startup, taught, teach, urgently, weak, willingly

quote: Just ticking boxes is not the ultimate goal here. Embracing a culture of teamwork and discipline is. And if we recognised the opportunity, the two-minute WHO checklist is just a start.
author: Atul Gawande, The Checklist Manifesto: How to Get Things Right

quote: What is happening is something new in my life. I think many people have a sense of shape, of unfolding, in their lives. This sense makes it possible for them to say: Yes, this new person is important to me: he, or she, is the beginning of something I must live through. Or: This emotion, which I have not felt before, is not the alien I believed it to be. It will now be part of me and I must deal with it.It is easy now, looking back over my life to say: That Anna, in that time, was such and such a person. And then, five years later, she was such and such. A year, two years, five years of a certain kind of being can be rolled up and tucked away, or ‘named’ — yes, during that time I was like that. Well now I am in the middle of such a period, and when it is over I shall glance back at it casually and say: Yes, that’s what I was.
author: Doris Lessing, The Golden Notebook

quote: The light that filled my house was deep and livid, half magnolia, half rainwater. Things sat in it, dark and very still.
author: Helen Macdonald, H is for Hawk

quote: Great leadership involves three things. The ability to realize when you are wrong, a willingness to learn from it, and an eagerness to change course if necessary.
author: Jeffrey Fry
category: ability, change, eagerness, great, involves, leadership, learn, necessary, realize, things, three, willingness, wrong

quote: You can change a body, but you can't change a soul. The heart wants what it wants.
author: Chris Colfer, Stranger Than Fanfiction

quote: Does the butterfly lose time in the months it grows from caterpillar to flying beauty? One day, I’m going to want to sleep twelve hours at a stretch and I won’t be able to. I’m not losing time. I am going through a metamorphosis.
author: Jacquelyn Nicole Davis, Trace The Grace: A Memoir

quote: If we lived the plans we do more as bets than as forecasts, we would be less anxious and more prepared for the unexpected.
author: Luigina Sgarro

quote: Clouds in the sky very much resembles the thoughts in our minds! Both changes perpetually from one second to another!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan
category: change, clouds, ildan-wisdom, ildan-wise-sayings, ildan-words, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotations, mehmet-murat-ildan-quotes, thoughts, thoughts-of-the-mind, thoughts-quotes, turkish-authors, turkish-literature, turkish-playwrights, turkish-quotations, turkish-quotes, turkish-wisdom-words, turkish-writers

quote: [Tolstoy] denounced [many historians'] lamentable tendency to simplify. The experts stumble onto a battlefield, into a parliament or public square, and demand, "Where is he? Where is he?" "Where is who?" "The hero, of course! The leader, the creator, the great man!" And having found him, they promptly ignore all his peers and troops and advisors. They close their eyes and abstract their Napoleon from the mud and the smoke and the masses on either side, and marvel at how such a figure could possibly have prevailed in so many battles and commanded the destiny of an entire continent. "There was an eye to see in this man," wrote Thomas Carlyle about Napoleon in 1840, "a soul to dare and do. He rose naturally to be the King. All men saw that he was such."But Tolstoy saw differently. "Kings are the slaves of history," he declared. "The unconscious swarmlike life of mankind uses every moment of a king's life as an instrument for its purposes." Kings and commanders and presidents did not interest Tolstoy. History, his history, looks elsewhere: it is the study of infinitely incremental, imperceptible change from one state of being (peace) to another (war).The experts claimed that the decisions of exceptional men could explain all of history's great events. For the novelist, this belief was evidence of their failure to grasp the reality of an incremental change brought about by the multitude's infinitely small actions.
author: Daniel Tammet, Thinking In Numbers: On Life, Love, Meaning, and Math
category: causation, cause-and-effect, change, famous-people, historians, history, objectivity, tolstoy

quote: Racist legacy laws and modern racist practices are all part of the same system, and it needs to be changed now.
author: DaShanne Stokes
category: bias, biased, biases, change, civil-rights, discrimination, discrimination-quotes, institutional-oppression, law, prejudice, prejudiced, prejudices, race, race-and-racism-in-america, race-in-america, race-relations, racism, racism-in-america, racism-quote, racism-quotes, social-change

quote: Be the time he finds his way out of the chamber and the planetarium, he has become me.
author: Dexter Palmer, The Dream of Perpetual Motion
category: change, coming-of-age, dexter-palmer, life-changing, narrator, the-dream-of-perpetual-motion, transformation

quote: We think the world is steady, rolling through space beneath our feet, day and night, rain and sunlight. And then, one day, you just fall off the planet and drift away, into outer space, and everything you thought was true all the laws that bound your life before, all the rules and norms that kept things in place, that kept you in place, they're gone. And nothing makes sense anymore. Gravity is gone. Love is gone.
author: Nickolas Butler

quote: I don't care who you were. I don't care who you are and I am more concerned with who you're working to become.
author: Baylor Barbee

quote: Of course, the truth is that no one likes change. People in hell not only refuse to leave it, they invite you in, too. Even people who have blasted the other lives that touched their own blasted lives proudly declare in old age that they would not change a thing -- all that cursing and screaming was their life, by God, and it is not possible to imagine any other. Change introduces unpredictability, uncertainty, a universe of disorder. Right before an amoeba splits in two, it says to itself, uh uh, no way, I ain't gonna do that, nope.
author: Peter Straub, Brief Lives

quote: Take a close look at nature and you’ll see that every living creature is wired for mutation and variation. The fact that people can say, “I’m not the same person I used to be,” is the greatest of all miracles.
author: Toni Sorenson, The Great Brain Cleanse
category: brain, change, fitness, health, life, miracle

quote: It is impossible to come to God and not experience changes in your life
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: I wasn’t crying, but my heart was crying. I wasn’t feeling, but my heart was bleeding. Now I am crying, but my heart is healing. I am learning that I know nothing.

category: broken-heart, change, crying-quotes, feelings-and-emotions, healing, heartbreak, knowing-oneself

quote: You can flip a coin to change its face, but it remains the same coin.
author: DaShanne Stokes
category: change, change-quotes, changes, coin, coin-flipping, difference, differences, essence, essence-of-things, flipping-coin, identity, identity-quotes, sameness, transformation

quote: I’ve learned to turn life’s setbacks into opportunities for creation.
author: Benyf, 11.11.11 After so Many Years of Tears: Letters to My Distant Soul-Mate

quote: You are constantly becoming what you have been deserving to be, and if you do not like the scripting, you have all the mens to change it for better.
author: Sandeep Sahajpal

quote: Healing restores to wholeness that which has been injured or fragmented.
author: Sharon Weil, ChangeAbility: How Artists, Activists, and Awakeners Navigate Change

quote: You can change your Job but u cannot choose your calling
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: Change your language, change your mindset, change your actions, change your life

quote: Popular upheaval, political turmoil, industrial progress—any combination of these can cause the evolution of a society to leapfrog generations, sweeping aside aspects of the past that might otherwise have lingered for decades. And this must be especially so, when those with newfound power are men who distrust any form of hesitation or nuance, and who prize self-assurance above all.

category: change, political, progress, revolution, russian-revolution, society

quote: We see so much bad and evil that we forget there could still be good left, somewhere. If you think you deserve to be treated well, it’s a sign that there still so much good left. People only treat us as best as their ability allows them; if you deserve more, try as much as you can to treat them better.

quote: The way I see it, you can live your life as is, continuing to feel like an underdog, or you can step up. Be someone who matters, and make a change.

quote: Healing is essential for lasting change. ...healing is a transformation, not just a quick fix; a change from an inhibited or impaired state to one of greater health, integration and connection. What was damaged must be soothed, repaired, restored, and given new pathways in which to grow and flourish. In order for change to be thorough, old patterns need to be dissolved, and new, more coherent and refined constructs, formed. In creating coherency in new forms, what has become fragmented or separated, injured or diseased must be made whole again, or perhaps made whole for the first time.

quote: Emotions have their own movement. They move like waves: huge tsunami waves, choppy rapids, or long slow tides. The best way I know to work with emotion, especially strong and difficult emotion is to let it move like a wave, allow it to complete its movement and, eventually, to leave. If the movement gets held back, if it gets trapped and stagnates, or an inner turbulence stirs, the unexpressed emotion and grief can turn into physical illness, fatigue, depression, anxiety, or other displaced emotion.

category: anxiety, change, depression, emotions, fatigue, inspirational-quotes, motivational-quotes, movement, turbulence, wave

quote: Introspection leads to insights
author: insights tell us what needs to change.

quote: Let’s create positive change on this planet; With either: the hyper sophisticated tools we have, or the mobile device we are
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: Take the chance, change is possible.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: There is no "the way things are." Every day is different, and you live it differently.

quote: Once you accept your circumstances and decide to take action, you can welcome change. Change is an opportunity to form new habits and become who you are meant to be.
author: Farshad Asl, The "No Excuses" Mindset: A Life of Purpose, Passion, and Clarity

quote: Change was coming.Change was coming, and it was good.
author: Lisa Berne, The Laird Takes a Bride

quote: In changing times, question everything you take for granted.
author: Gyan Nagpal

quote: Whether the changes that are coming in your life will be unexpected or determined by your choices and actions, the wheels are in motion. The adventure has just begun.
author: Teresa R. Funke, Bursts of Brilliance for a Creative Life blog
category: adventure, art, blogging-quote, brilliance, change, dream-big, inspiration, trajectory

quote: We give people political labels, sexual labels, and religious labels. But in the process, we strip them of their individuality and complexity. Prejudice is pre-judging. It's assuming that bad stories end badly, but Jesus is in the business of turning bad beginnings into happily ever afters....God cannot give up on you. It's not in His nature. His goodness and mercy will follow you all the days of your life. All you have to do is turn around. All you have to do is crash the party!
author: Mark Batterson, All In: You Are One Decision Away From a Totally Different Life

quote: The spiritual tipping point is when the pain of staying the same becomes greater than the pain of change. Sadly, too many of us get comfortable with comfort. We follow Christ to the point of inconvenience, but no further. That's when we need a prophet to walk into our lives, throw a mantle around our shoulders, and wake us up to a new possibility, a new reality. We need a prophet to boldly confront Plan B and call us back to Plan A.
author: Mark Batterson, All In: You Are One Decision Away From a Totally Different Life

quote: In the late nineteenth century women lodgers, alone in the city, epitomized the purity of endangered woman-hood; in the early twentieth century the same women were among the first "respectable" women broadcast as happy sexual objects.
author: Jeanne Meyerowitz

quote: Truth is always a turning point.
author: Sheila Walsh, Loved Back to Life: How I Found the Courage to Live Free

quote: Life will change for us the moment we decide to change our minds.
author: Kabelo Mabona

quote: Innovation is the result of a process that brings radical ideas to create positive change
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: You know you are changing when you no longer have points of references. Mapping a new life.
author: Natasha Tsakos
category: change, learning, life, new, perspective, reference

quote: It is strange a difference comes from a subtraction.
author: Natasha Tsakos

quote: If mediocrity is your benchmark, you always sit on the bench!
author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quote: Without a clear-cut vision and a proper reading of the roadmap we may not reach the buoyant shores of the horizon. If we only keep looking into the middle distance, we might easily walk straight into the wall. ("Change of Vision")

category: buoyant, change, clear-cut, easily, horizon, look-into, middle-distance, proper, reach, reading, roadmap, shores, vision, walk-into-the-wall

quote: Let us remember to always rediscover one anotherbecause we are forever changing.
